transcript: I had a mentor 10 12 years ago and I had had a particularly good weekend and I went into work I said yeah I said this great weekend and she said something really insightful and she's like I'm pretty sure the key to happiness is stringing as many days in a row like that as you can and from a business life perspective that's very much the path that I followed I looked back at the last few years of my life and was like okay what were the good days what were the bad days what were the common things that happen on my bad days okay how do I not do that stuff and then what were the common things that happen on my good days well how do I do more of that and over the last few years I've just tried to engineer my days to just be as many many of the good things in a row as I can
